task: SCAFFOLD a simple Tasks frontend UI

planning.name: agent-bootstrap
planning.objective: Create project shell and entrypoint: initialize frontend app structure, mount root component, add basic page layout, and wire a simple placeholder route/view container for tasks.

planning.name: agent-state
planning.objective: Define initial client-side task model and state management: create in-memory task list shape, add create/read/update/delete primitives, and connect it to UI-facing APIs.

planning.name: agent-components
planning.objective: Build core reusable UI components for task list rendering, task item rows, add-task form/input controls, and empty/loading states with minimal interaction flows.

planning.name: agent-styles
planning.objective: Implement baseline styling and layout for the Tasks UI: typography, spacing, responsive list layout, and lightweight visual states (hover/focus/selected), ensuring it looks like a coherent first-version scaffold.
